metadata.synopsis: Patron chatter on Elfsong Tavern - Wrilda Gemfinder.

0.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
0.text: Oh, look, the provincial is still around. Taking notes on how the city folk do things?
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

1.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
1.text: I haven't seen you here before. And dressed like that, I doubt I'll see you here again.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

2.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
2.text: Archduke? Lord Gortash is a trifle young for that, don't you think? Not that anyone cares what you think, or me, for that matter.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

3.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
3.text: One can only hope that by tomorrow everyone stops talking about Lorroakan's end. So tedious.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Lorroakan has been deposed from Ramazith's Tower + no longer owns Sorcerous Sundries

4.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
4.text: They say that tiresome young man they made Archduke has passed away suddenly. None too soon, if you ask me.

5.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
5.text: Though now that I think about it, if there's a new manager at the Sundries, maybe they'll have a sale.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: Rolan as new owner of Sorcerous Sundries

6.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
6.text: Shouldn't you be out earning the plaudits of a grateful nation, or something?
6.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

7.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
7.text: And now Rolan, another jumped-up youngster, is said to be in charge of Sorcerous Sundries! The whole town is following Elturel to hell.
7.context: InternalNodeContext: Rolan as new owner of Sorcerous Sundries

8.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
8.text: I was lying down with a headache when that rumbling from the harbour practically threw me to the floor. Swear to Sune.
8.context: InternalNodeContext: Iron Throne Destruction (ie. vague trouble in harbour)

9.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
9.text: Everyone acts pleased about the fall of Lorroakan, but he was less tiresome than that old lecher Ramazith. Couldn't keep his paws off my posterior, the cad.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Lorroakan has been deposed from Ramazith's Tower + no longer owns Sorcerous Sundries

10.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
10.text: Was I rude to you before? My manners are quite dreadful, frankly.
10.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

11.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
11.text: I understand you've done something creditable, though I couldn't be bothered to read the entire article.
11.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

12.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
12.text: One can hope that after they clear up that mess in the harbour, they'll allow new shipments to come in again. I'm all out of Neverwinter talcum powder.
12.context: InternalNodeContext: Iron Throne Destruction (ie. vague trouble in harbour)

13.speaker: Wrilda Gemfinder
13.text: At least Gortash seemed to have a plan for what to do about these Absolute nuisances.
